column5: I came across this while reading the paper online.  Now that is one big UGLY fish!!  World Record Carp
You are right about the ulgy factor!!!  What a massive fish...looks like it has about 4 of the size carp I catch in it's belly!!!
Hm m m  m  m   m    ?? The one I missed Saturday musta been about that size?

Seems like it's another 80+lb fish out of Rainbow. Ironically it was caught at peg 19, 1 peg away from where Gary Hagues caught his world record in November for the first and second times.  Minutes before he caught that fish, he managed to get a 69lb common carp.  I wonder how much groundbaiting those anglers at that lake actually do?  http://www.dailymail.co.uk/pages/live/arti...in_page_id=1770
o man, and it's a mirror too eh ...
I think in that part of the world, mirrors are more common than here.
Imagine the weight on the end of the rod!
Thats a good point. I wonder would it movr slowly since its so big or would it give a tremendous battle.
The only thing grosser than that fish is getting thrown into the polluted mess that the fish lived in.Big fish all the same. Joe
